title: Powering the future: Germany's Wasserstoffstrategie in the transition to climate neutrality – case study on green hydrogen for the chemical industry
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00246F, Perspective
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Valentin Benedikt Seithümmer, Julia Valentina Lutz, Samuel Jaro Kaufmann, Haripriya Chinnaraj, Paul Rößner, Kai Peter Birke
Analysis and calculation of Germany's climate politics and hydrogen strategy, with a focus on the technical demand for hydrogen implementation through a case study of the chemical industry that engages multiple stakeholders.
